text: Ivan Oleksiyovych Ivanov (, born 8 January 1989) is a Ukrainian professional triathlete. In 2013 he finished second at the ITU Aquathlon World Championships. He earned a bronze medal at the ITU World Cup event in Edmonton. Ivanov competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics, finishing 49th. Initially he had not qualified. ==References== Category:Ukrainian male triathletes Category:Olympic triathletes of Ukraine Category:Triathletes at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Living people Category:1989 births Category:People from Horishni Plavni Category:European Games competitors for Ukraine Category:Triathletes at the 2015 European Games
title: Ivan Ivanov (triathlete)
